mosais.GUI

Interface GuiState

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MosaisGUI.DefaultState, MosaisGUI.PictureSelectedState, MosaisGUI.PointsOnlyState

    public interface GuiState
    Represents the state of the GUI when different controls are selected
    Author:
    Andrew Trismen

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void enterState()
      Set up the state upon transitioning.
      void handlePicSelected()
      Handle clicking the picture selection button and selecting a picture.
      void handlePointsOnlyToggle()
      Handle toggling the points only check box.
      void handleStart()
      Handle pressing the Start Button.
